snippet: The federal government cited the Bartlett Grain Company for willful safety violations and proposed a $406,000 fine for a deadly explosion last October at a grain elevator in Atchison.
abstract: Federal government cites the Bartlett Grain Company for willful safety violations, proposing a $406,000 fine for an explosion that killed six workers in October 2011 at a grain elevator.
lead_paragraph: The federal government cited the Bartlett Grain Company for willful safety violations and proposed a $406,000 fine for a deadly explosion last October at a grain elevator in Atchison.

headline.main: Kansas: Grain Company Is Cited in Accident
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Grain Company Is Cited In Accident
